name: Figma
description: Generate code from Figma designs, extract design context, variables, and components through Figma's official hosted MCP server. Supports Code Connect for design system consistency, FigJam content, and browser-to-Figma live capture.

auth.instructions: Connect via OAuth when prompted. Your browser will open to authorize access to your Figma account. Requires a Figma account with Dev or Full seat on Professional/Organization/Enterprise plan for full rate limits.
